TC.Description: Verify disclaimer screen is appear during buy process through Paynow process
Verify page is redirect to cover summary screen when answer Yes to certainity question through Paynow process
Verify page is redirect to cover summary screen when answer no to certainity question through Paynow process
Verify quote reference is replaced by policy reference when answer Yes to certainity question through Paynow process
Verify quote reference is replaced by policy reference when answer No to certainity question through Paynow process

Verify page is redirect to cover summary screen when answer no to certainity question through Invoice process
